work.name: sona
work.position: Head of Engineering, Front End Engineer, Architect
work.summary: Leadership, Architecture, React, Typescript, Tailwind, RadixUI, React Aria, React Query, Jotai, NextJS, Server Components, Server Actions, Drizzle ORM, Planetscale, Neon, Redis, Resend, Ethereum, viem, Privy, MetaMask, WalletConnect, Ponder, Playwright, pnpm, TurboRepo, Posthog, Vercel
highlights: Lead the engineering team responsible for the streaming music app and marketplace, artist dashboard, infrastructure, blockchain. [Leadership]

Responsible for all web application architecture, including component, page rendering, front end blockchain integration, and integration with back end services.  [NextJS, React, Typescript, TurboRepo, pnpm, Vercel]

Migrated the music app from client rendered pages to the NextJS App Router, using React Server Components and Server Actions, significantly improving performance, eliminating nearly all custom APIs and improving developer velocity and quality. [NextJS, Server Components, Server Actions, RSC, Vercel, Drizzle ORM]

Built Sona Wallet, including on and offramps. Sona Wallet included our own embedded wallet supplied by Privy, and user supplied wallets via MetaMask or WalletConnect. [viem, Privy, MetaMask, WalletConnect, Stripe Onramp, Ansible Beam Offramp, blockchain, web3]
Built Sona’s Reserve Auction feature, allowing Artists to auction an NFT representing a song. [viem, blockchain, erc721]
Responsible for all blockchain indexing using Ponder. [viem, Ponder, blockchain, erc721]
Created transactional e-mail system to automate the creation and sending of rich React and Tailwind based e-mails from any Sona application. [Resend]
Built Design System with Tailwind and a mix of RadixUI and React Aria. [Tailwind, RadixUI, React Aria]
Built custom Redis/Upstash data caching mechanism to replace the built in NextJS/Vercel cache. [Redis, Cache, Upstash]

work.name: niftys
work.summary: Architecture, React, Typescript, CSS Modules, swr, NextJS, Prisma, MySQL, Ethereum, Ethers, Magic Wallet, MetaMask, Mux, Vercel
highlights: Responsible for new front end architecture at Nifty’s [Leadership, Architecture, NextJS, Vercel, Typescript]
Built new multi chain abstractions, making web3 feel like web2 for engineers. [Magic Wallet, web3, ethers]

Architected new community focused section of the website, allowing communities and brands to create their own NFT driven experiences for their members and fans. [NextJS, React, Typescript, CSS Modules]
Architected new application engine which will allow communities to design and create their own “apps” by piecing together various mechanics around NFTs. [ethers, web3, react, prisma, typescript]
Integrated payment and crypto onramp with Stripe, Wyre, and Moonpay [ethers, web3, stripe, wyre, moonpay]
Built new media component that handled both video and image size and device optimization, cropping, inline blurred placeholders, thumbnails, etc. [Next Image, Mux, html video, AWS SIH]

work.name: grubhub
work.summary: React, Typescript, CSS Modules, SASS, TestCafe, ReportPortal, NextJS, Preact, AST, Jenkins
highlights: Lead early development of next generation front end architecture for grubhub.com [Next.js, React, TypeScript]
Assisted LyftGrubhub team in using Next.js to develop the statically generated lyftgrubhub.com [Next.js, React, TypeScript]
Developed tools to help migrate grubhub.com from Preact to React [AST]
Redesigned release process to support daily releases [Pager Duty, QA, End to End Tests]
Streamlined end to end testing and analysis [TestCafe, ReportPortal]
As part of new cross organization front end platform team, developed standard libraries to be used by all web teams and applications [TypeScript]

work.name: jet
work.summary: React, Typescript, Styled Components, SASS, NextJS, Redux, Apollo, GraphQL, Node.js, WAI-ARIA, PCI
highlights: Lead experimental performance focused rearchitecture of Jet product page, cutting "first paint" time in half, and "time to interactive" by over 80% [Next.js, React, Apollo, GraphQL, Node.js, SASS]
Helped architect specialized experiences for different “departments” and brands such as Apple and Nike [React, Redux, Styled Components]
Added full WAI-ARIA Accessibility functionality for global site navigation [React, JavaScript, HTML]
Migrated significant portions of the site from legacy CMS to new Walmart CMS [React, Redux]
Responsible for tracking down memory leaks and other server side performance issues as we completed the transition to Next.js [Next.js, Node.js]
Worked to ensure full PCI Security Standards compliance [React, Redux, Next.js]

work.name: national-hockey-league-2
work.summary: JavaScript, ExtJS, Sencha Touch, Java, MySQL, AGRest, SASS, Node.js, Sencha CMD, npm, git, Bitbucket, Bamboo, Sonatype Nexus
highlights: Developed custom UI framework that provided a foundation for new applications, including components, theming and a universal API [ExtJS, Java, MySQL, AGRest, Sass]
Developed build tools in order to manage our homegrown package repository, including build, deploying, version bumping and tagging [Node.js, Sencha CMD, npm, git]
Developed suite of fully responsive applications to manage officials, including scheduling, calendars, reporting, contacts, injury reporting, and several others [ExtJS, Java, MySQL, AGRest]
Developed mobile application allowing general managers to make roster changes from their phones [Sencha Touch, Java]
Developed application to manage and report on all league marketing spending [ExtJS, Java, MySQL]
Consulted on introduction of CI/CD tools including source management, security auditing, and build and deploy pipelines [Bitbucket, Bamboo, Sonatype Nexus]

work.name: morgan-stanley-wealth-management
work.summary: JavaScript, ExtJS, Sencha CMD, Java, REST
highlights: Developed reporting systems for high net worth clients, included components to allow advisers to visit with clients and interact directly with reports, research, and account information on tablets or laptops [ExtJS]
Modernized and redesigned project structure to encourage better decoupling of components, provide better scalability, and make it easier to maintain and enhance [ExtJS, Sencha CMD]
Worked with team developing REST API to standardize on a custom protocol to work well with our UI framework [ExtJS, JavaScript, Java]

work.name: national-hockey-league-1
work.summary: JavaScript, ExtJS, Sencha Touch, Java, MySQL, Lotus Notes and Domino, Microsoft Active Directory, Longana, AGRest, JaxRS, Apache Cayenne
highlights: Designed and managed the development of league intranet, consolidating all applications in a single, consistent interface. [ExtJS, Sencha Touch, Lotus Notes and Domino, MySQL]

Developed authentication and user administration system using a combination of Domino Directory, Microsoft Active Directory and MySQL to provide league employees, team employees and external partners with a single sign in for both new and legacy applications [ExtJS, Lotus Domino Directory, Microsoft Active Directory, MySQL]

Managed migration of several applications from Lotus Notes to new ExtJS/Java environment, including Media Game Notes, Amateur Scouting, HR Systems, Team Finance and Analytics, Brand Asset Management and various other applications. [ExtJS, Java]

Developed framework to automatically generate views and data stores from Lotus Notes views, enabling the league to quickly deliver web based front ends to legacy Lotus Notes applications [ExtJS, Lotus Notes and Domino, Longana]

Developed REST based framework and API that included support for filtering, sorting, paging and all other options required by front end data store functionality [ExtJS, Java, AGRest, JaxRS, Apache Cayenne]

Designed advanced menu system customized for the training needs for each client [Lotus Notes and Domino, JavaScript, HTML, CSS]
Designed and developed system to automatically generate nightly Excel reports for each client. [Lotus Notes and Domino, COM/VBA, Excel]

Administered network including DNS, Firewall and user management [Unix]
Responsible for developing all internal applications [Lotus Notes and Domino, JavaScript, HTML, CSS]

Designed and developed system for senior management to submit, discuss, review and approve new financial products [Lotus Notes and Domino]
Maintained approximately 35 operational applications for the wholesale bank [Lotus Notes and Domino]

work.summary: Lotus Notes and Domino, COM/VBA, PowerPoint

Created process to automate presentation generation for M&A proposals [Lotus Notes, COM/VBA, PowerPoint]

work.name: prudential-healthcare
highlights: Spent three years processing health and dental insurance claims before moving to engineering to work on the claims systems. [data entry]
Worked as a liaison between business units and programming staff to specify changes and enhancements to the claims systems. [systems analysis]
Developed test plans and performed quality assurance for those changes. [qa, testing]

Developed reports detailing production and quality of 48 claims offices throughout the United States, used to assist in analysis during consolidation of offices to 4 regional centers [Microsoft Access]
Worked with Oracle, Netscape, Sun Microsystems and a team of four analysts in development of the healthcare insurance industry’s first web based benefits management system [Java, HTML]
Worked closely with clients such as Cincinnati Bell, Johnson and Johnson, and PSE&G to analyze methods for integrating our platform with their internal systems [system analysis]
